statements: SELECT * FROM PatientData;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age FROM PatientData WHERE patient_gender = 'Male';
SELECT * FROM PatientData WHERE patient_name LIKE 'John%';
SELECT patient_name, patient_age, patient_gender FROM PatientData ORDER BY patient_age DESC;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age, patient_gender, medical_records FROM PatientData WHERE patient_age > 30;
SELECT * FROM PatientData WHERE patient_gender = 'Male';
SELECT patient_name, patient_age FROM PatientData WHERE patient_age > 30 ORDER BY patient_age DESC;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, patient_age FROM PatientData WHERE patient_age < 25 AND patient_gender = 'Female';
SELECT JSONB_ARRAY_ELEMENTS(medical_records) FROM PatientData;
SELECT * FROM PatientData WHERE patient_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE age > 30;
SELECT name, age FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT * FROM medical_records WHERE diagnosis ILIKE '%flu%';
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT patient_id, name FROM patients ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, age, gender FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT name, diagnosis, doctor_name FROM patients JOIN medical_records ON patients.patient_id = medical_records.patient_id WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%flu%' ORDER BY patients.name;
SELECT * FROM medical_records WHERE date_reported BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY date_reported DESC;

SELECT patient_id, name, diagnosis, treatment FROM patients JOIN medical_records ON patients.patient_id = medical_records.patient_id WHERE treatment IS NOT NULL ORDER BY patient_id ASC, treatment DESC;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age, patient_gender FROM Patients;
SELECT MAX(patient_age) AS max_age FROM Patients;
SELECT MIN(patient_age) AS min_age, COUNT(*) AS total_patients FROM Patients;
SELECT * FROM MedicalRecords WHERE diagnosis = 'Covid-19';
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE patient_age > 50;
SELECT patient_name, patient_gender FROM Patients WHERE patient_blood_type = 'AB';
SELECT Patients.patient_name, MedicalRecords.record_date FROM Patients INNER JOIN MedicalRecords ON Patients.patient_id = MedicalRecords.patient_id;
SELECT * FROM MedicalRecords WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%diabetes%' OR diagnosis LIKE '%hypertension%';
SELECT AIHealthcareApps.app_name, COUNT(AIHealthcareApps.app_id) AS total_apps FROM AIHealthcareApps GROUP BY AIHealthcareApps.app_name HAVING COUNT(AIHealthcareApps.app_id) > 1;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, age FROM patients WHERE age > 30;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, gender FROM patients ORDER BY patient_name DESC;
SELECT doctor_id, doctor_name, specialization FROM doctors;
SELECT appointment_id, appointment_date, appointment_time FROM appointments WHERE appointment_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM patients ORDER BY age DESC, patient_name ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patients WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY gender, patient_name;

SELECT d.doctor_name, d.specialization, COUNT(a.appointment_id) AS num_appointments FROM doctors d LEFT JOIN appointments a ON d.doctor_id = a.doctor_id GROUP BY d.doctor_id ORDER BY num_appointments DESC;
SELECT p.patient_name, m.diagnosis, m.treatment_plan FROM patients p INNER JOIN medical_records m ON p.patient_id = m.patient_id WHERE m.record_date = '2022-03-15';

SELECT p.patient_name, m.record_date, a.appointment_date, a.appointment_time FROM patients p INNER JOIN medical_records m ON p.patient_id = m.patient_id INNER JOIN appointments a ON p.patient_id = a.patient_id WHERE p.age BETWEEN 20 AND 40 ORDER BY p.age ASC, m.record_date DESC, a.appointment_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE patient_age > 30;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, patient_gender FROM Patients WHERE patient_gender = 'Male';
SELECT patient_name, patient_address FROM Patients WHERE patient_age < 25;
SELECT * FROM MedicalRecords WHERE diagnosis = 'Diabetes' ORDER BY visit_date DESC;
SELECT doctor_name, doctor_specialty FROM Doctors WHERE doctor_specialty = 'Cardiology';
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE patient_gender = 'Male';
SELECT patient_id, patient_name FROM Patients WHERE patient_age > 50;
SELECT doctor_name, doctor_specialty FROM Doctors ORDER BY doctor_specialty ASC;
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis, prescription FROM Patients JOIN MedicalRecords ON Patients.patient_id = MedicalRecords.patient_id;
SELECT hospital_name, hospital_address FROM hospitals WHERE hospital_contact LIKE '%@example.com';
